sentence.Network_en: "I appreciate your concern for my feelings," Bess said huffily, "but I'm a big girl now".
sentence.Network_cn: “多谢你关心我的感受，”贝丝气鼓鼓地说，“但我现在已经长大了。”

PerfectNetExp.abs: Chapter 2 - Joy Sun... ... 019-01 the wear and tear 折腾 019-10 huffily adv. 怒气冲冲地 019-11 cut sb. down 打断某人讲话.

entry.def: Someone who is huffy is obviously annoyed or offended about something.

example.ex: I, in my turn, became embarrassed and huffy and told her to take the money back.
example.tran: 这下轮到我既尴尬又气愤了，我告诉她把钱拿回去。

sentences.sentence: "`Don't bother to call me back,' he said huffily"

auth_sentence.content: "Well, Mondrian only painted in primary colors, and he would never have put green in a canvas," Rockefeller said huffily.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Well, Mondrian only painted in primary colors, and he would never have put green in a canvas," Rockefeller said huffily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Well, Mondrian only painted in primary colors, and he would never have put green in a canvas," Rockefeller said huffily.
